Name: Le Sang Jaune (The Yellow Blood)
Ingredients: 50 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon and orange zest twists.
Express lemon and orange zest twists over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirituous apple and rich elderflower with herbal dry vermouth and gentian complexity, finished with the merest hint of anise courtesy of a dash of absinthe.
History: Adapted from a cocktail created in 2017 by Mauricio Barbosa at Tuju in São Paulo, Brazil. Mauricio's original recipe called for 50ml Calvados, 20ml Noilly Prat, 15ml St-Germain, 5ml homemade gentian liqueur and 5 drops absinthe bitters.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Sang Jaune (The Yellow Blood) contains 193 calories
